speakers.name: Prof. Rajesh Raj
speakers.description: A  scholar in Yogic Sciences and Parapsychology, with a Post-Doctorate from the University of Vienna, Austria. As founder of Ritanveshi and scientist at Maurine Research Institute, he brings 25+ years of expertise in Raja Yoga, Prana Vidya, Nada Yoga, Tantra Yoga, and Hatha Yoga.

speakers.name: Jaehong Lee
speakers.description: A seasoned yoga teacher, combines India’s diverse yoga traditions with global expertise. He founded South Korea’s first therapeutic yoga studio, led 100+ workshops, presented at global conferences, and designed corporate wellness programs for Samsung and Naver.

speakers.name: Nicole Hermann
speakers.description: From Brazil, she is an expert in asana and pranayama. She specializes in immediate relaxation, balancing stress, controlling anxiety, managing emotions, and boosting energy. Her practices help individuals cope with depression and maintain emotional well-being.
